message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly enhance your productivity and efficiency. Given its high quality and unique features, I am confident it will be of great value to you. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $100.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product. However, I'm hoping to find a solution within my budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate a lower price? I'm interested in purchasing the product for $80.
